alert.note: Alert for Monmouth; Ocean (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:02PM EDT until July 02 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL OCEAN AND SOUTHEASTERN MONMOUTH COUNTIES... At 602 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Howell, or 10 miles west of Asbury Park, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Branch, Asbury Park, Howell, Tinton Falls, Farmingdale, Jacksons Mills, West Freehold, Adelphia, Vista Center, Elberon, Collingwood Park, Freewood Acres, Allenwood, Eatontown, West Long Branch, Oceanport, Neptune City, Spring Lake Heights, Bradley Beach and Spring Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 195 in New Jersey between mile markers 20 and 34. Garden State Parkway between mile markers 97 and 107. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
